attributes.action: Dispose of the Snapchat update! No one wants this...
attributes.additional_details: The evidence for this theory is the app, look it up.
attributes.background: We have all just received this profound an quite simply terrible update from an application more commonly known as 'Shitchat' or some people call it Snapchat and we want to protest to get the old simple Snapchat back.

rejection.details:
The UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for Snapchat.

You can find out more about the role of the UK Government and Parliament here: 

http://www.parliament.uk/education/about-your-parliament/what-parliament-does/
